page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: Clayton West housing consists mainly of modern cul'de'sacs, ten to fifteen years old.Most of the old housing is up Victoria Street and in Scissett. Pennine Way is part of a modern housing estate in Scissett. The houses there are detached. Many are ten to fifteen years old and are made from a mixture of brick and stone. There is a small group of detached houses made from red brick on the side of Wheatley Hill. There are quite a few old stone houses on Wakefield Road,and these houses,dating from the 1900's are cheaper, selling for Â£16,000 to Â£25,000. A lot of these have been changed into shop.
